name: MineSweeper (chenqiangpan)
description:
A MineSweeper game

Click/Tap the face to restart the game:

For Touch Screen: 

------- Use Horizontal screen

------- Click Shovel / Flag  to toggle input

------- In Flag mode, Tap a unrevealed tile to add/remove Flag

-------Double Tap a Revealed Tile: if tapped tile's clue number equals surrounding flagged tiles, then reveal all surrounding tiles (if there is mine under the flagged tile, game over)

For PC:

-------Left click: DIG

-------Right click: ADD/REMOVE FLAG

-------Middle Click / Double Click:  if clicked tile's clue number equals surrounding flagged tiles, then reveal all surrounding tiles (if there is mine under the flagged tile, game over)
